attributes.action: No more more votes. 'No deal is better than a bad deal'. Britain to leave the EU
attributes.additional_details:
The house of Lords, ex prime ministers and Gina Miller are trying to have more votes that go against the democratic will of the British people. This is a petition to say that the British people do not want any more votes by Judges, by the House of Lords, by the house of commons or by the people in a referendum.
Everyone has had there vote. The decision is to leave the EU. If the EU offer a bad deal, then we leave with no deal.
attributes.background:
Prime minister Theresa May tells EU that 'no deal is better than a bad deal for Britain'.
No more votes. No more delays. We the British pupic voted for the UK to leave the EU.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
